objectives.dialogue: Welcome! Let's start by learning about tags and elements. Head over to the NPC to begin!
Great job! Now let's learn about nesting HTML elements. Go to the next NPC to continue.

objectives.objective_name: Understand the anatomy of an HTML page
objectives.dialogue: You're doing amazing! Next, let's understand the anatomy of an HTML page. Visit the next NPC.

objectives.objective_name: Identify the most common HTML elements
objectives.dialogue: Almost there! Let's identify the most common HTML elements. Head to the next NPC.

evaluation.dialogue: You've completed all objectives! Now it's time for the evaluation. Head to the enemy to begin.

post_evaluation.pass: Congratulations! You've passed the evaluation. Well done!
post_evaluation.fail: Unfortunately, you didn't pass the evaluation. Try again!
